ISSUE.TITLE: [feature]: Filters : Add Modules as a filter
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Summary Following [feature]: Display : Group by module #2863 **What:** - Be able to filter the issues by Module in all the view (except Modules view) **How:** - When selecting the Filters button , add the module selection to be able to select more than one module **Where:** - Everywhere except the Modules view(Issues,Cycles,Views) - For all the layout type ### Why should this be worked on? Use Case: For big dev team/ big software, with many modules, you may want to look only some specific modules (UIs or backend modules)
